Author: sharpshoot
Title: Knowledge is power, 30 books every young entrepreneur should read

Author: staunch
Content: Check Silicon Mechanics, Rackable.com, or just forward Dell your Sun quote and have them beat it if you want. For a small amount of gear though it doesn't really matter much. I'm certainly not saying Sun makes bad stuff either (they do overstate their differentiation though), just that they charge a premium like Apple does.\n
